# validUntilTime

## Summary

Specifies until when the artifact can be used before its usage needs to be reassessed.


## Description

A validUntilTime specifies until when the artifact can be used before its usage needs to be reassessed.


## Metadata

- name: validUntilTime
- Nature: DataProperty
- Range: DateTime
